thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Keith Pearson
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Keith Pearson

author: Keith Pearson
title: Keith Pearson
text:
The three nominated tenders provided quotations with 2 to 3 days, all Quote: s were competitive, and all followed up with a telephone calls outlining their quotations and asking if we had any questions.
We selected a one of the companies quotations, (not the lowest) now we will wait and see if the service provided is as good as the company sales representative says it is.
